title: Akudo Sabi
text: Akudo Sabi (born ) is a female Nigerian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. She was part of the <a href="Nigeria%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Nigeria women's national football team</a> at the <a href="Football%20at%20the%202004%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%20tournament">2004 Summer Olympics</a>. She was selected for the FIFA U-19 Women's World Championship All-Star Team in 2004. On club level she played for <a href="Bayelsa%20Queens">Bayelsa Queens</a>.
